mosinstall.description:
The Infobar module shows an informationbar at the top of the page to unregistered users.

You'll have to edit your template index.php file, and insert

mosLoadModules('header', -1);

directly below the body tag. You can use whatever module position you want here. header position is just an example.

  • Display a "activeX" lookalike informationbar at the top of the page
  • Boost your user registrations
  • Edit the text to display in backend module configuration
  • Edit register link in backend module configuration

If you like this module, please make a Donation!


Thanks ;)
